content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Copper Plate Factory at position (0, 0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace at position (0.0, 0.0)
- Furnace at position (2.0, 0.0)
- Furnace at position (2.0, 2.0)

### Copper Ore Mine at position (x=-28.5, y=-61.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill at position (x1, y1)
- Burner mining drill at position (x2, y2)

### Iron Ore Mine at position (x=-15.5, y=-50.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill at position (x3, y3)
- Burner mining drill at position (x4, y4)

### Electricity Generator at position (x)
Consists of:
- Steam engine at position (x1)
- Boiler at position (y1)
- Offshore pump at position (z1)

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors related to crafting items
- Ensure you have the required ingredients in your inventory before attempting to craft items. Check your inventory frequently.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity in a tile before attempting to place it. Check for existing entities in the intended position.

### Errors related to entity status
- Regularly check the status of your furnaces and other machines to ensure they have the necessary ingredients and fuel to operate efficiently.
